summary.span: 从 Visual Basic 2005 开始，此类已被否决。

span.span: This class has been deprecated as of Visual Basic 2005.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供用于操作可能表示的数据的方法`String`值。This class provides methods for manipulating data that potentially represents a `String` value.

param.name: StartPosition
param.span: 要在 sDest 参数中进行覆盖的起始位置。

span.span: Location in the sDest parameter to begin overwriting from.

param.name: MaxInsertLength
param.span: 要从 sInsert 参数中使用的最大字符数（从第一个字符开始算起）。

span.span: Maximum number of characters from the sInsert parameter to use, starting from the first character.

param.name: sInsert
param.span: 用于覆盖 sDest 参数的字符串值。

span.span: String value to overwrite the sDest parameter with.

summary.span: 使用 参数的内容覆盖 参数。

span.span: Overwrites the parameter with the contents of the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool StrLike (string Source, string Pattern, Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompareMethod CompareOption);
.method public static bool StrLike(string Source, string Pattern, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompareMethod CompareOption) cil managed
Public Shared Function StrLike (Source As String, Pattern As String, CompareOption As CompareMethod) As Boolean
public: static bool StrLike(System::String ^ Source, System::String ^ Pattern, Microsoft::VisualBasic::CompareMethod CompareOption);

param.name: Pattern
param.span: 任何符合 Like 运算符中所述的模式匹配约定的 表达式。

span.span: Any expression conforming to the pattern-matching conventions described in Like Operator.

param.name: CompareOption
param.span: 根据 指定如何将字符串与模式进行比较。

span.span: Specifies how to compare strings to patterns, according to the .

param.span: 对于二进制比较，可以是 ；对于基于不区分大小写的文本排列顺序（由系统的 值确定）的比较，可以是 。

span.span: Can be for binary comparison or for comparison based on a case-insensitive text sort order determined by your system's value.

summary.span: 对参数 和 进行比较，并返回与 运算符相同的结果。

span.span: Compares the parameters and and returns the same results as the operator.

returns.span: 一个 值，指示字符串是否满足模式的要求。

span.span: A value indicating whether or not the string satisfies the pattern.

returns.span: 如果字符串中的值满足模式中包含的模式的要求，则结果为 。

span.span: If the value in string satisfies the pattern contained in pattern, result is .

returns.span: 如果字符串不满足模式的要求，则结果为 。

span.span: If the string does not satisfy the pattern, result is .

returns.span: 如果字符串和模式都是空字符串，则结果为 。

span.span: If both string and pattern are empty strings, the result is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法比较参数`Source`和`Pattern`并返回与相同的结果[Like 运算符](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/like-operator.md)。This method compares the parameters `Source` and `Pattern` and returns the same results as the [Like Operator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/like-operator.md). 结果是一个布尔值，该值指示字符串满足模式。The result is a Boolean value indicating whether or not the string satisfies the pattern.

span.span: Any expression conforming to the pattern-matching conventions described in Like Operator.

returns.span: 一个 值，指示字符串是否满足模式的要求。

span.span: A value indicating whether or not the string satisfies the pattern.

returns.span: 如果字符串中的值满足模式中包含的模式的要求，则结果为 。

span.span: If the value in string satisfies the pattern contained in pattern, result is .

returns.span: 如果字符串不满足模式的要求，则结果为 。

span.span: If the string does not satisfy the pattern, result is .

returns.span: 如果字符串和模式都是空字符串，则结果为 。

span.span: If both string and pattern are empty strings, the result is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法比较参数`Source`和`Pattern`并返回与相同的结果[Like 运算符](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/like-operator.md)。This method compares the parameters `Source` and `Pattern` and returns the same results as the [Like Operator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/like-operator.md). 结果是一个布尔值，该值指示字符串满足模式。The result is a Boolean value indicating whether or not the string satisfies the pattern. 此方法类似于是，只不过它始终执行区分大小写的二进制比较。This method is similar to except that it always performs a case-sensitive binary comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool StrLikeText (string Source, string Pattern);
.method public static bool StrLikeText(string Source, string Pattern) cil managed
Public Shared Function StrLikeText (Source As String, Pattern As String) As Boolean
public: static bool StrLikeText(System::String ^ Source, System::String ^ Pattern);

param.name: Pattern
param.span: 任何符合 Like 运算符中所述的模式匹配约定的 表达式。

span.span: Any expression conforming to the pattern-matching conventions described in Like Operator.

summary.span: 使用文本比较对参数 和 进行比较，并返回与 运算符相同的结果。

span.span: Compares the parameters and and returns the same results as the operator, using text comparison.

returns.span: 一个 值，指示字符串是否满足模式的要求。

span.span: A value indicating whether or not the string satisfies the pattern.

returns.span: 如果字符串中的值满足模式中包含的模式的要求，则结果为 。

span.span: If the value in string satisfies the pattern contained in pattern, result is .

returns.span: 如果字符串不满足模式的要求，则结果为 。

span.span: If the string does not satisfy the pattern, result is .

returns.span: 如果字符串和模式都是空字符串，则结果为 。

span.span: If both string and pattern are empty strings, the result is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法比较参数`Source`和`Pattern`并返回与相同的结果[Like 运算符](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/like-operator.md)。This method compares the parameters `Source` and `Pattern` and returns the same results as the [Like Operator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/like-operator.md). 结果是`Boolean`值，该值指示是否字符串满足模式。The result is a `Boolean` value indicating whether or not the string satisfies the pattern. 此方法类似于是，只不过它总是执行基于由你的系统的不区分大小写的文本排序顺序的比较`LocaleID`值。This method is similar to except that it always performs a comparison based on a case-insensitive text sort order determined by your system's `LocaleID` value.
